data.name: 冒险时光机
data.detailed_description:
Adventure time machine is about an ordinary person who accidentally found a time machine and then mistakenly started it. How can he go back to the original time?

After entering different time and space, you will control different roles and challenge different time and space gatekeepers.

Characteristic function: you can freely switch the use of melee long-range attack form, each boss has a unique interactive function.

When the protagonist passes through time and space, I seem to hear that "masked man" and "skeleton" master the method of controlling the time machine

This game adopts retro pixel style, players can relive the memories of childhood game console in this game, and enjoy the pleasure after defeating boss.
data.about_the_game:
Adventure time machine is about an ordinary person who accidentally found a time machine and then mistakenly started it. How can he go back to the original time?

After entering different time and space, you will control different roles and challenge different time and space gatekeepers.

Characteristic function: you can freely switch the use of melee long-range attack form, each boss has a unique interactive function.

When the protagonist passes through time and space, I seem to hear that "masked man" and "skeleton" master the method of controlling the time machine

This game adopts retro pixel style, players can relive the memories of childhood game console in this game, and enjoy the pleasure after defeating boss.
data.short_description: A 2D horizontal board gameGame mechanism: players can freely switch between melee and long-range attacks to defeat NPC.This game adopts retro pixel stylePlayer operation: A: move left; D: move right; space: jump; J: normal attack; K: skill attack (prerequisite)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
